sentiment_analysis.summary: The customer was having trouble syncing a user's personal Gmail account with their PCR mail, and the agent was able to guide them through the necessary steps to enable SMTP client authentication in the Microsoft admin portal, which resolved the issue.

call_resolution.problem_statement: The customer, Jeremy Vanzelis from SARTorx Group, was having trouble updating a user's email address in PCR (Patient Care Record) from a personal Gmail account to their work email address. The issue was that the email sync was not working properly.
call_resolution.resolution_details: The employee, Garrett, was able to identify the issue and guide the customer through the steps to enable SMTP client authentication in the Microsoft admin portal. However, the changes have not taken effect yet and the email sync is still not working.

follow_up.details: The employee needs to follow up with the customer in 10-15 minutes to check if the email sync is working after the authentication changes have been applied.

missed_best_practices: Providing the employee's contact information for future reference
improvement_suggestions: The employee could have provided their contact information to the customer in case the issue persists or the customer has any further questions.
